title: Adventures with God
overview: For 10 years, Darren Wilson has traveled the world in an attempt to film God and discover His true nature and character. These adventures were captured in several popular films that have helped shape the faith and lives of millions around the world. But there is so much more to the story that could never make the films. Adventures with God is an exciting new chapter in Darren's journey, and is sure to please anyone with even a passing interest in God or faith.
